data.persona: I'm a guard in the royal army. I'm also a personal guard to the king. I feel a sense of pride protecting my country. Standing in one place for hours a day is quite boring and taxing on my body. I train everyday after guarding duty to keep myself healthy.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's a table, a record, and a trunk here.
The cockroach and the a priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the cockroach with my sword
data.mid_motivation: I don't want the cockroach to eat up the papers in the storage room today
data.long_motivation: I plan to keep on protecting the kingdom from all threats, big and small alike
